name: PixelOS
changelog:
• added applock
  • added smart pixels
  • added button to switch to other slot in recovery
  • slider to animation scales
  • fixed allow hotspot clients to use vpns
  • improved fod on popups (thanks to @Skyblueborb)
  • updated kernelsu and susfs
  • may patch merged
notes:
• Known issues: remount doesn't work
  • Non RDP
  • With Gapps
  • KSU-Next + SUSfs -> installing magisk will cause bootloop
  • Screen off FOD
  • Be aware: an user reported hardware damage after using clear speaker feature. as me and other tester were unable to reproduce such damage, feature is still present, but to prevent any potential harm, use it only if needed.
  • Installation instructions: telegra.ph
